title: Dissertatio Chronologica Pro Chronologiae Scaligerianae Veritate
creator: Franckenberger, Reinhold  Braun, Matthaeus  Wellerus, Jacobus  Metsch, Fridericus  Reichbrod, Christianus  Frisen, Henricus a  Clengel, Casparus
